hints.content:
Lucky hid $\tealE{21}$ coins in the backyard and $\goldE{14}$ coins in the kitchen. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/8fee6f31e8df77edb0c8b4926c0a5caa5a61cab0)

$\tealE{21} + \goldE{14} = \maroonD{35}$

Lucky still has $\blueE{13}$ coins to hide.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/53e13ce203730d381fba8684e3377d755a2ac835)

$\maroonD{35} + \blueE{13} = \purpleD{48}$

There were $\purpleD{48}$ total coins in his bag.
Lucky had $\purpleD{48}$ gold coins in his bag at the start.

question.content:
Lucky has a bag of gold coins. She hides $21$ gold coins in the backyard and $14$ gold coins in the kitchen.  Lucky still has $13$ coins to hide.   

**How many gold coins were in Lucky's bag at the start?**
    
[[☃ numeric-input 1]] gold coins
